posts.post_content:
I've been plucking away at this set for close to a decade and have challenged myself to finish it in 2023.  Please let me know if you have one you can live without!

Bender
Groom
Keeler
Lennox
Lord
Wallace
Wilson

Looking for VG-ish eye appeal, but technical grade is less important. No pin holes please. Prefer raw but will certainly consider slabbed!
have a very nice Kling, tough card. PSA pop is about 1/2 of most of the other non-hofers. $800 delivered. Check, MO or Zelle

I have  this 2 from your list. Pm me if your interested.

[IMG]https://photos.imageevent.com/ruckers/t201t202/large/lennox1.jpeg[/IMG]
[IMG]https://photos.imageevent.com/ruckers/t201t202/large/closeplay.png[/IMG]
Still need some help if you can! 7 to go! :)
